details.description: Exported interface `Account` has no JSDoc comment describing fields, invariants, or expected values.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc for the interface and document `id` and `balance` meaning and edge cases (e.g. negative balances).

details.description: Exported function `calculateInterest` lacks documentation about parameters, return value, and edge cases (negative values, NaN).
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc including description, @param tags for `balance` and `rate`, @returns and notes about edge cases and behavior (no rounding, possible negative/NaN results).

details.description: Exported class `AccountService` has no class-level documentation describing purpose, storage semantics, or lifecycle.
details.fix_explanation: Add class-level JSDoc explaining that this is an in-memory repository, persistence characteristics, and that methods perform no validation.

details.description: Public method `getAccount` is undocumented; callers don't know returned null behavior or validation semantics.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc describing parameter, return value (`Account | null`), and edge cases (returns null if not found).

details.description: Public method `saveAccount` is undocumented; callers don't know whether it overwrites existing accounts or performs validation.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc describing parameter, side effects (upsert/overwrite), and lack of validation.
